name: Warp Visualizer
description:
What is this?

This project is a music visualizer based on Unity particle system. 

It creates a colored warp effects with various adjustable settings. It features an automatic mode that adapts the settings to the music you're listening to and a manual mode where you can change every settings. It needs to be seen more as an experiment or a prototype that a complete project that doesn't need improvements.

Please note that the automatic mode is disabled in WebGL as it requires to use a file manager to load a music from your computer.

Do not use this software if you are under the influence of drug or alcohol. 

How to Use?

You can disable the UI at any moment by pressing the comma ( , ) key

Automatic mode

The automatic mode adapts the settings automically to the music you've loaded from your computer. The music needs to be in a .wav format, you can finds samples music in the "sample" folder.

  • Use the Load Music button to load a music from your computer. 
  • The speed settings will adapt automatically
  • You can still change the colors and sounds settings
Manual mode

In the manual mode, you can tweak every settings yourself! Sadly, the pitch setting will be disabled as it need to music to be played inside the software to be effective.

  • Make sure that "Automatic mode" is unchecked   
  • Put a background music or sound for a better experience
  • Have fun and explore the settings!

Know Bugs

As this project is a prototype, it still contain bugs:

The automatic mode music detection algortimh sometimes fail and think a slow music is fast and vice-versa. The samples musics has been selected specially to fit well with it.
